GtvCell* gtv_edge_is_boundary ( GtsEdge *  e,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Check if a GtsEdge lies on the boundary of a GtvVolume.

Parameters:
e a GtsEdge;
v a GtvVolume or NULL.
Returns:
a GtvCell which uses e and is on the boundary of v.

GtvFacet* gtv_facet_from_vertices ( GtsVertex *  v1,
GtsVertex *  v2,
GtsVertex *  v3 
)

Find a GtvFacet which uses three given GtsVertex's.

Parameters:
v1 a GtsVertex;
v2 a GtsVertex;
v3 a GtsVertex.
Returns:
a GtvFacet which uses v1, v2 and v3, if it exists, NULL otherwise.

gboolean gtv_facet_has_edge ( GtvFacet *  f,
GtsEdge *  e 
)

Check if a GtvFacet uses a GtsEdge.

Parameters:
f a GtvFacet;
e a GtsEdge;
Returns:
TRUE if f use e, FALSE otherwise.

Check if a GtvFacet uses a GtsVertex.

GtvFacet* gtv_facet_new ( GtvFacetClass *  klass,
GtsEdge *  e1,
GtsEdge *  e2,
GtsEdge *  e3 
)

Make a new GtvFacet from three edges which must define a proper triangle.

Parameters:
klass a GtvFacetClass;
e1 a GtsEdge;
e2 a GtsEdge;
e3 a GtsEdge.
Returns:
a new GtvFacet or NULL if the edges do not define a valid triangle.

gint gtv_facet_tetrahedra ( GtvFacet *  f,
GtvTetrahedron **  t1,
GtvTetrahedron **  t2 
)

Find the tetrahedra which use a GtvFacet.

Parameters:
f a GtvFacet
t1 a GtvTetrahedron which uses f or NULL if f is isolated;
t2 a GtvTetrahedron which uses f or NULL if f is a boundary facet.
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

gint gtv_facet_tetrahedra_vertices ( GtvFacet *  f,
GtsVertex **  v1,
GtsVertex **  v2,
GtsVertex **  v3,
GtsVertex **  v4,
GtsVertex **  v5 
)

Find the vertices of the tetrahedra sharing a particular facet. If f is used by only one tetrahedron, v5 will be NULL. If f is an isolated facet, i.e. not used by any tetrahedra, all the vertices will be NULL.

Parameters:
f a GtvFacet
v1 a vertex of a tetrahedron using f;
v2 a vertex of a tetrahedron using f;
v3 a vertex of a tetrahedron using f;
v4 a vertex of a tetrahedron using f;
v5 a vertex of a tetrahedron using f.
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

GtvCell* gtv_vertex_is_boundary ( GtsVertex *  p,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Check if a GtsVertex lies on the boundary of a GtvVolume.

Parameters:
p a GtsVertex;
v a GtvVolume or NULL.
Returns:
a GtvCell which uses p and is on the boundary of v.
